sentences.sContent: The medium of fresco makes great demands on a painter's techinical skill.
sentences.sContent_eng: The medium of fresco makes great demands on a painter's techinical skill.
sentences.sCn: 壁画这种绘画形式对画家的技巧有很高要求。

sentences.sContent: We show this in a scene in the Sistine Chapel [in Rome] where we create a big crack in the fresco of God and Adam.
sentences.sContent_eng: We show this in a scene in the Sistine Chapel [in Rome] where we create a big crack in the fresco of God and Adam.
sentences.sCn: 我们将这个观点放到了发生在罗马西斯廷教堂的一幕里——一幅绘有上帝与亚当的壁画发生严重断裂。

sentences.sContent: Today, much of it is occupied by government offices and only vestiges of its beauty endure – admittedly including Gozzoli's fresco of the journey of the Magi.
sentences.sContent_eng: Today, much of it is occupied by government offices and only vestiges of its beauty endure – admittedly including Gozzoli's fresco of the journey of the Magi.
sentences.sCn: 如今政府办公室占据了它很多的建筑，而梅迪奇·里卡尔第宫也仅保留一丝当年的痕迹--这其中包括戈佐利所绘的壁画《三圣贤之旅》。

trans.tranOther: a painting made on a wall while the  plaster  is still wet
